title: Byteman 4.0.21 has been released
content: Byteman 4.0.21 is now available from the and from the . It is the latest update release for use on all JDK9+ runtimes up to and including JDK21.    Byteman 4.0.21 is a maintenance release which enables Byteman to be used with JDK21 releases. It also contains one  small bug fixes and a feature enhancement. More details are provided in the and the latest .
